title: Beginning Ballroom Dance
description: Selected ballroom dances including the cha-cha-cha, foxtrot, merengue, rumba, samba, swing, tango, waltz, and line dance hustle. Emphasis on alignment, etiquette, leading and following, performance techniques, and presentation of simple dance phrases. Purchase of concert ticket(s) may be required. Total credit limited to 6 units. 2 activities.
